title: LoL Championship Thresh Merch Skin
body: Hi, I just got the thresh merch package with the code. I however, need some help actully activationg it. The website to activate it doesnt work.

replies.body: Thanks For The Tips! I used safari and I got to stage 1 however stage 2 didnt show any instructions and when i finally figured i needed to put my username/password in it i couldnt press enter and it just had me stay there. If you could help me with this problem what would be great :D

Hey BruteKnight,

I've heard of this from a few players, but I haven't been able to reproduce this issue recently. I know you're excited to try out the Tresh skin so let's see what we can do about it. Can you try a few things to see if we can get the promotional site working? Here are a few things I tried when I encountered it a few times before:

* Access the website with all extensions/add-ons turned off. Some browser have a (No Add-ons) option so you don't have to manually turn everything off.
* Refresh the browser. There were a few times where I could choose the language, log in, and the page appeared blank (minus the background); after refreshing the browser, it loaded fine.
* Try a different browser. If you use Edge/Internet Explorer/Safari, try Firefox; if you use Firefox, try Chrome; if you use Chrome... try any of the above.

Those are the basics. If you continue having trouble, feel free to contact us via the [Support Site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) and my colleagues will help you out!
